cleaned_text: All of our Crystal products are handcrafted with love and are unprocessed, premium 100% authentic natural crystals. Perfect for meditation, mindfulness, chakra healing or a simple and stunning addition to the home. Share the love, self-care, and one of a kind, natural vibes with your special ones. Your best friends, mum, sisters, wife, daughter, grandma, are going to love them.
